Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HAUDIO

The basic type HAUDIO is a handle to a quick API handle (it can contain digital or MIDI data).

Discussion

HAUDIO handles are returned from the AIL_quick_load function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_quick_copy, AIL_quick_fss_load, AIL_quick_fss_load_and_play, AIL_quick_halt, AIL_quick_load, AIL_quick_load_and_play, AIL_quick_load_mem, AIL_quick_ms_length, AIL_quick_ms_position, AIL_quick_play, AIL_quick_set_ms_position, AIL_quick_set_reverb, AIL_quick_set_speed, AIL_quick_set_volume, AIL_quick_status, AIL_quick_type, AIL_quick_unload
